resources.string: This event puts the students through a stimulated version of the campus placement process.Begining with an aptitude test,the participiants will go on to appear for group discussions and evevntually sit for personal interviews.

-> First of all, participiants will be shortlisted on the basis of curriculum vitae.

 -> The Aptitude and English Proficiency Test and the Group Discussion will be the elimination round through which participiants will be selected for the Personal Interview.

 -> The 2-5 participiants will get a certificate of merit; however, each of the participiants will receive the certificate of participation.

 -> Any misbehaviour would automatically lead to disqualification.

Round 1:
 -> The format of the curriculum vitae will be provided immediately after registration which participants have to fill sincerely and proceed further.
 ->The prelimiary round will be an Aptitude and English Proficiency Test round.

 Round 2:
 -> The next challenge is the Group Discussion(GD) round, where participiants will be divided into certain number of groups to discuss certain topics, which will be provided on the spot.

 Round 3:
 -> And the final round is the Persional Interview.Both HR and Technical interviews will be conducted in a stimulated environment.

Contacts:
 Nayan Gupta:9462303121
 Abhishek Kumar:9472314440
 Abhishek:9729935020

Tired of rigmarole core subjects ?Don’t worry! If you have at least superficial knowledge of coding in tandem with mind as sharp as Holmes then this event belongs to you. It will test your programming skills and your acquaintance with IT field . Accomplish your dream of becoming an flamboyant coder. The repercussions shall be enhanced programming skills and broadened sense to solve aptitude questions to boost your career and win prizes.

1.Number of members in a team should be three. 2.Using any unfair means will lead to disqualification of the team. 3.In 1st round the scores(questions solved +Time taken) of all the three individual members of the team will be added to get cumulative score of the team. 4.70% seats in the 2nd round will be reserved for 1st years.\n Event rounds: It consist of three rounds.. 1 . Relay race--> In this each team will get a set of questions. And each participant have to solve his piece of question,just like relay race...... 2. Code-e-trical-->Team passing round 1 will participate in coding competition, in which they have to solve competitive coding questions. 3.Surprise round--> Information regarding this round will be given on-the-spot .

1.For 1st and 2nd rounds teams solving the maximum numbers of questions within minimum amount of time will go in the further round. 2.In second round participants have to pass all the given test cases to get full marks. 3.Information regarding "Surprise Round" will be given on-the-spot.
Avinash Chandrakar(3rd year) 7808747800 Sushant Pandey(2nd Year) 9304147910 Navneet Das(2nd year) 8802151814
